snippet: Federal officials finally spoke out on stop-and-frisk and urged use of an independent monitor if the program is found unconstitutional.
abstract: Editorial applauds Justice Department for endorsing idea of enlisting independent monitor to oversee New York City Police Department's stop-and-frisk program, in the event Judge Shira Scheindlin finds policy unconstitutional.
lead_paragraph: Federal officials finally spoke out on stop-and-frisk and urged use of an independent monitor if the program is found unconstitutional.

headline.main: A Loud Message to the N.Y.P.D.
